[] take the user typed value
[] search for the that particular movie through omdb api and with search parameter
[] show all the search listed movies on movie dashboard with poster, name and category
[] when user clicks on particular movie than grab that movie title and search for that movie
[] hide the default movie dashboard
[] show the particular movie details 
  [] poster
  [] rating 
  [] director 
  [] descirption
  [] year
  [] reviews and much more
[] when user clicks back movie button return him on searched page
[] when user clicks again back button or click trending menu than show default movie dashboard
[] show little heart on each movie
[] if user clicks on that than grab that movie details and add that movie to favourite tab
